item.title: Why Is Micron Stock Down In Premarket Today?
item.description: Shares continue to slide after declining nearly 5% on Friday.

item.title: Bitcoin Crashing Prompts Binance To Add 1,300 BTC To Its $1 Billion Safety Fund
item.description: This is the first time in two years that Binance has bought Bitcoin for its SAFU fund.

item.title: Why Is UUUU Stock Falling In Pre-Market Today?
item.description: The pullback comes after a rally driven by Trump-era nuclear policy signals and rising retail enthusiasm.

item.title: Why Is Nvidia Stock Down In Premarket?
item.description: A WSJ report has said that Nvidia's $100 billion cloud deal with OpenAI may have been stalled.

item.title: Pharming Stock Draws Retail Buzz After FDA Seeks More Data For Pediatric Immune Drug — Why Investors Aren’t Panicking
item.description: The company expressed confidence that it can resolve the FDA’s inquiries.
